#summary configuration flashvars
#labels flashvars,config,settings

= Flashvars =

 * hostname: the ip or server hostname which the client will connect to
 * port: the port mpd is being served on
 * dual_socket: false (default) or true; magic or more magic respectively. Seriously though, if you want to use the built-in console, set dual_socket mode on.
 * debug: integer from 0 upwards, where 0 is off. Refer to debug.html for example of use.

For more installation information see [usage]
